meanings.definition: A person who believes in the ultimate destiny of the universe.
meanings.sent1: She met a group of cosmists who discussed the future of the universe.
meanings.sent2: The cosmists gathered to contemplate the fate of all existence.
meanings.sent3: The cosmists planned a cosmic party to celebrate the universe's future.
meanings.sent4: In their minds, the cosmists held the universe's fate like a precious gem.
meanings.sent5: The cosmists' belief in the universe's destiny was unwavering.

meanings.definition: Belonging to or characteristic of cosmists.
meanings.sent1: The room was decorated with cosmists art, depicting cosmic wonders.
meanings.sent2: Her cosmists beliefs influenced her view of the universe.
meanings.sent3: The cosmists-themed party had guests dressed in cosmic attire.
meanings.sent4: The sky at night had a cosmists beauty that mesmerized all who gazed.
meanings.sent5: The cosmists influence could be seen in every aspect of her life.
